content: It is. It’s tough. I fought in Afghanistan, also, and quite frankly it certainly doesn’t make the issue any less complex, huh… I don’t have The Answer, I’m not certain anyone does, but I’ll keep reading and thinking and feeling for it. In the meantime, my family and church will still look for ways we can help our neighbors and show them rescue now and hoping they’ll see eternal rescue as well. I appreciate your heart and thought provoking writing.
